commit_title: Disable manual axis ranges for histograms
commit_message: UI and plot generation updates to prevent manual X/Y axis range overrides for histogram plots. In PlotLayout.tsx the Auto buttons are disabled when plotType === 'histogram', and min/max inputs are replaced with explanatory helper text. In PlotlyHelpers.ts the xaxis/yaxis range and autorange are adjusted so histograms always use autorange (range set to undefined and autorange true) while preserving existing behavior for other plot types. This ensures histogram binning/data density controls the displayed range.
